properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 10:54AM EST until January 25 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to 2 to 3 miles.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
